name: ScrabbleAid.com
overview:
ScrabbleAid is the best scrabble cheat online, an easy to use online scrabble word finder that helps players excel in the game. Simply put, there is not better scrabble word finder out there.

ScrabbleAid’s optional features helps to find words that match your board. Tell us how the word must begin, how it must end, or what letters must show up somewhere in the middle. Our intelligent WordFinder will do handle the rest!

With this scrabble cheat, words formable from the array of letters are generated for you, enabling you to cheat at scrabble with dignity. With our latest update, you can also now use your blank tile. Simply check the blank tile option to get possible words that can be made using your blank tile.

Anyone who has ever struggled to find that 50-pointer will find this scrabble finder an invaluable companion for every scrabble game. Finding the best word is only a few clicks away!

Once the scrabble finder returns results, you can easily sort them either by word length or by number of points. Easily spot that 8-letter word with the click of your mouse!
